title: Notes to Subscribers
description:
This channel exploded in the last fortnight. I wanted to thank those of you who subscribed and to give an update on the status of my thinking and effort and the best way to do it would be a short-ish video. 

Notes include: Thanks for subscribing
Learning the ways of the YouTube
Social media channels are silos with their own cultures
Who are the "sorters" and what should I call them?
We only see what we want to see
Ideas I have for the future of this channel
